# International Liquid Biopsy Consortium Landing Page

This Next.js application recreates the landing page for the International Liquid Biopsy Consortium with modern animations, components, and TypeScript support.

## Project Structure
- Next.js 14 with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Framer Motion for animations
- React components for each section
- Responsive design matching original HTML

## Components
- Hero section with animated background
- About section with cards
- Research areas grid
- Impact metrics
- Publications section
- Consortium members
- Call to action

## Development
- Run `npm run dev` to start development server
- Visit http://localhost:3000 to view the application
